It seems the config/configure file is broken. Switching off the
sundials fl=
ag:

USE_SUNDIALS=3D'n'

some checks (i.e. object file extension, etc..) ar=
e skipped and the
resulting Makefiles are wrong. It maybe this error has be=
en already
corrected in the CVS version, otherwise use the 1.6.0 version.
I=
 hope this helps
  MAX
